name: Pawsitively Purrrple
description:
Pawsitively Purrrple began as a large (7 in!) sculpture and is now available in a small version.

This small Pawsitively Purrrple sculpture measures 2.5" (6.35cm) high from foot to tail and is 2.25" (5.7cm) long. This sculpture is made with royal purple polymer clay and accented with artic white and lavender paw prints. Due to the nature of handmade items,your sculpture may vary slightly from listing photo.


Browse the shop for other colors and sizes. Sculptures can be special ordered for particular colors that are not shown. Contact me with any special requests.

__________
SHIPPING

USPS First Class in a 6x6 box.

name: Black Cat Hand Painted Pin
description:
This adorable pin is made of polymer clay, cut in a modern shape and hand-painted to look like the face of a black cat. It measures 1.75" (4.5cm) long by 1" (2.5cm) wide and has an acrylic gloss coating. This pin wants to stare at the world from your shirt. Signed by the artist.

__________
SHIPPING

This pin will ship via USPS in a padded envelope. If purchased with another item, they will ship in a box via USPS.

name: Sitting . . . Scheming, Pomegranate
description:
Endless Whimsy's NEWEST POSE!

It's been a while in the making, but it's been worth it. After much trial and error over the past year, a sitting pose has been born!

Sitting . . . Scheming is a tribute to all those times you look at your cute kitty and wonder 'what's going on in that brain of yours'. . .we'll I'll tell ya - Stoli (one of my cats) is constantly planning his next adventure.

Sitting . . . Scheming, pomegranate, is 2.5" (6.35cm) tall

_____________________________
SHIPPING

will be USPS First Class in either a padded envelope or box depending on size and amount purchased.

name: "Nakita" - Custom Tribute Sculpture
description:
A tribute to your special kitty! For our feline mates that have us trained to cater to their every whim day after day. And to those who have left us for greener pastures over the 'rainbow bridge'.

Place your custom sculpture on your desk, shelf, piano, table, or nightstand.

This listing is for a 3" Catnap in the coloring of your choice - Tabby, Calico, Pointed, Solid Color, Tuxedo etc. - or fun, whimsical colors like Pomegranate or even Wasabi. Add a heart, wings or flowers on your sculpture.

Each sculpture will be lovingly hand sculpted with variants of every color used to add depth to the sculpture. I will place the name of your cat on the bottom of the sculpture and sign and date it.

name: YOU PICK - Custom Feline Frolic Sculpture (3in)
description:
This listing is for anyone! If you can dream it, I can make it!

Choose any color for this sculpture that measures just over 3" (7.62cm) high from foot to tail. The Feline Frolic sculpture will be handmade from the new "Studio" line of Sculpey polymer clay. Due to the nature of handmade items, your sculpture may vary slightly from listing photo.

About the new "Studio" Sculpey: [Studio has] "rich, home d√©cor colors and bakes to a luxurious, suede-like finish". This clay is my new favorite! It is beautiful, delicate yet super sturdy. It feels like leather, cotton, velvet and rock all in one! When you place your order - I'll get my daily hand massage therapy with this stuff!

Please specify by email or in note to seller what color or colors (marbled/dotted) you'd like to have made.

COLORS:
http://ny-image0.etsy.com/il_fullxfull.17950376.jpg

If you can provide a description or a photograph of a specific color - we'll do our best to replicate it.

Remember - you choose the color for this 3" Feline Frolic Sculpture.

This listing will be handled as a 'custom' order and will take longer before shipment. Please let me know if you need your order in a rush, and I'll adjust the listing price for you.

__________
SHIPPING

All Endless Whimsy sculptures ship in gift packaging.

This sculpture will ship in a box via USPS. If purchased with another sculpture, together they will ship in a box via USPS.
